original_title: きかんしゃ　やえもん
overview: A 3D movie that was aired first on 03.October 2009. The DVD became available on 21.02.2010 titled “CG Toei Anime Matsuri” and it contained 3 other CG anime works by Toei (Gegege no Kitarou: Kitarou’s Ghost Train, Digimon Savers 3D: Digital World Kiki Ippatsu! and Digimon Adventure 3D: Digimon Grand Prix!).
title: Kikansha Yaemon
